title: DJI Air 3 Active Track: Ultimate Test & Tips Video
content:
For those into seeing how autonomous sports tracking in drones continues to progress, Iâ€™ve just hit publish on my latest video covering the DJI Air 3. I dig into a ton of different scenarios from over the past month into what has worked well, not so well, and everything in between.

Plus, I include a ton of tips on how to get the most from Active Track, as well as how to avoid killing your drone while using it. Be it running, riding, boating or anything else. Dive on in by hitting the little play button above.

Thanks for watching!
author: DC Rainmaker
